		<title>mysears-general copy</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/?attachment_id=652</link>

		<title>meat</title>

	<item>
		<title>What are the best sunscreens out there?</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/what-are-the-best-sunscreens-out-there/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 21 Aug 2012 15:19:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=551</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>For years, most of us have dutifully applied<a href="http://www.kmart.com/shc/s/p_10151_10104_015V002112729000P?vName=Beauty&amp;cName=Sun+Care&amp;sName=Sunscreen&amp;prdNo=3&amp;blockNo=3&amp;blockType=G3&amp;sid=MMLxarticlexmerch" target="_blank">sunscreen</a>before heading outdoors, confident that we were doing the right thing to<a href="http://www.managemylife.com/mmh/projects/avoid_skin_damage?intcmp=clink">protect our skin</a>from sunburn, premature aging and skin cancer. But research is casting doubt on the ability of sunscreens to do much more than stop sunburn, and some studies have found that ingredients in certain sunscreens might actually lead to greater sun damage.</div>
Knowing what to look for in sunscreen  and what to avoid  can help you find a product that protects your skin without unwanted side effects.
<h2>Truths about Sunscreen</h2>
<img src="http://www.mysears.com/managed_images/8572/original/sunscreen.JPG?1341870709" alt="" width="170" height="255" />

Yes, sunscreen prevents sunburn, but, surprisingly, that's about it, according to recent research. Here are the facts to counter some common misconceptions:

<strong>Sunscreens aren't proven to prevent skin cancer or premature aging</strong>. A<a href="http://www.fda.gov/OHRMS/DOCKETS/98fr/07-4131.htm" target="_blank">2007 Food and Drug Administration (FDA) review of scientific literature</a>led the agency to conclude that "FDA does not believe, as a whole, that the studies demonstrate that sunscreens alone help prevent skin aging or skin cancer."

<strong>SPF numbers above 50 aren't reliable</strong>. The same 2007 FDA report found that SPF ratings greater than 50 are misleading because tests are inconclusive as to whether they block out a higher percentage of the sun's rays than lower-rated products. The FDA took a similar position in 1999 about SPFs higher than 30, until results demonstrated that SPF ratings between 30 and 50 were reliable.

<strong>Some sunscreen ingredients can promote skin damage</strong>. FDA research has shown that vitamin A, when exposed to sunlight, can increase the development of tumors in test animals. Vitamin A is a common ingredient in sunscreens because it decreases the signs of aging.

In addition, some sunscreen ingredients release skin-damaging free radicals as the ingredients break down. Using enough sunscreen and reapplying helps prevent this problem, but few people use enough sunscreen, or reapply often enough.

<strong>A little sun without sunscreen is good for you</strong>. Sunlight reacts with a pigment in the skin to produce vitamin D, a process that sunscreen seems to inhibit. Vitamin D is essential to good health  it strengthens bones and the immune system, among other benefits. The best way to get enough vitamin D is under debate in the medical community, but the American Medical Association recommends exposing the skin to 10 minutes a day of sun without sunscreen.
<h2>What to Avoid in Sunscreen</h2>
The<a href="http://www.ewg.org/2010sunscreen/" target="_blank">2010 Sunscreen Guide</a>by the Environmental Working Group found that only 39 of the 1,400 sunscreens it evaluated provided protection against<a href="http://www.managemylife.com/mmh/questions/190958-whats-the-difference-between-uvb-radiation-and-uva-radiation?intcmp=clink">UVA and UVB rays</a>and contained no ingredients the group considers unsafe.
<h3>Ingredients</h3>
Watch out for these unsafe ingredients:

<strong>Oxybenzone</strong>has been linked to allergies, hormone disruption and cell damage.

<strong>Vitamin A</strong>has been linked to skin cancer. You might see it listed as retinyl palmitate, which is a synthetic form of vitamin A.

<strong>Insect repellent.</strong>The chemicals that make sunscreens penetrate the skin also allow the pesticides in insect repellent to be absorbed. If you absolutely need insect repellent, apply it separately after the sunscreen dries.
<h3>Formulation</h3>
Sprays and powders (such as cosmetic powders) disperse particles into the air, where you can inhale them. Even sunscreen ingredients that are safe when applied as a cream  such as zinc oxide and titanium dioxide  can be hazardous when inhaled.
<h3>SPF</h3>
Until the FDA determines that ratings over SPF 50 are reliable, stick to something between 30 and 50.
<h2>What You Want in Sunscreen</h2>
<img src="http://content.managemyhome.com/Images/articles/sunscreen-and-hat.jpg" alt="Sun protection" width="190" border="0" />
<h3>Ingredients</h3>
Choose ingredients that protect against UVA rays, which have been linked to premature aging and skin cancer, as well as UVB, which cause burning. Those ingredients include the minerals zinc oxide and titanium dioxide, which sit on the skin rather than being absorbed; avobenzone; and Mexoryl SX, which isn't widely used.
<h3>Formulation</h3>
A cream, gel or stick formulation is safer than a spray or powder because there's less risk of inhaling the product.
<h3>SPF</h3>
The SPF rating indicates how well a sunscreen deflects UVB rays. SPF 15 filters out 93 percent of the UVB rays; SPF 30 filters 97percent; and SPF 50 filters 98 percent.

Most dermatologists recommend using at least SPF 30, year round.
<h2>Getting the Most from Your Sunscreen</h2>
<strong>Apply early</strong>. Apply sunscreen about half an hour before sun exposure, so the sunscreen has time to bind to the skin.

<strong>Use enough</strong>. Most people don't apply nearly enough sunscreen. The recommended amount is 1 ounce for an average-sized adult. That's about as much as a shot glass holds.

<strong>Reapply often</strong>. Don't let that SPF 50 make you complacent about reapplying. Even a waterproof sunscreen wears off if you sweat or swim. Reapply a full amount at least every two hours. If you're swimming or sweating a lot, reapply more often.
<h2>Sun Protection Beyond Sunscreen</h2>
Don't get the idea that you should cut out sunscreen all together. Choose sunscreen wisely and remember that it isnt the only sun protection you need. Here is a list of other things to do to protect yourself from the sun:

<strong>Wear protective clothing</strong>. It may be summer, but wearing lightweight long-sleeved shirts and pants helps block the sun's UV rays. A large-brimmed hat protects your face.

<strong>Relax in the shade</strong>. Either find natural shade under a tree or make your own with an umbrella or canopy.

<strong>Don't go out in peak sun hours</strong>. Avoid the sun between the hours of 10 am and 2 pm, when the sun is directly overhead. The best time to be outdoors is either in the early morning or the late afternoon, when the sun is lower in the sky.

<strong>Always wear sunglasses</strong>. Get<a href="http://www.managemylife.com/mmh/questions/156353-expensive-sunglasses-cheap-ones?intcmp=clink">sunglasses</a>that block UV rays to protect your eyes when outdoors and when driving. Not only does squinting cause wrinkles, but UV rays can cause cataracts.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Improve your health</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/improve-your-health/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 21 Aug 2012 15:27:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=553</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>Ellipticals Trainers Build Stamina, Endurance and a Strong Cardiovascular System</div>
<div>

You can use elliptical trainers to improve your health. NordicTrack and Sole trainers help you tone your body, burn calories and increase your cardiovascular health. At Sears, you can find hundreds of ellipticals and accessories to build your endurance and stamina.

The use of elliptical trainers takes the stress off your feet as you walk. Jogging and speed-walking can cause pain in your lower body, especially the heels and arches of your feet. If you do suffer from heel pain from constant walking, you can relieve the pain by using a Fellowes or JB International <a title="Foot Rockers" href="http://www.sears.com/search=foot+rockers?vName=">foot rocker</a>. Use the rocker to stretch your foot and to reduce heel, arch and lower body pain.

In fact, you should stretch your muscles before engaging in any activity on the elliptical. Using a <a title="Bean Exercisers" href="http://www.sears.com/search=bean+exercisers?vName=Fitness+%26+Sports&amp;viewItems=25&amp;autoRedirect=true&amp;prop17=bean%20exercisers">bean exerciser</a>, you can effectively stretch all of the muscles in your body with a few simple routines. Stretching before a workout can reduce the risk of muscle injuries such as rips, tears and pulls.

<a title="Elliptical Mats" href="http://www.sears.com/search=elliptical+mats?vName=Fitness+%26+Sports&amp;viewItems=25&amp;autoRedirect=true&amp;prop17=elliptical%20mats">Elliptical mats</a> are useful because they create an extra cushion between you, the machine and the floor. In addition, a Kamway or SportsArt bike mat keeps the elliptical from slipping as you exercise, and it also prevents the machine from scratching the floor.

Elliptical trainers are important machines for any workout room. To get the maximum results from your workout, you need the right elliptical and accessories. Shop Sears for affordable elliptical trainers and supplies to give you an edge in your training.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>HDTV Buying Guide</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/hdtv-buying-guide/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 22 Aug 2012 14:45:48 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=648</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;
<div>
<h1>TV Buying Guide - Where to begin?</h1>
Updated February 3, 2011 2:18 PM PST by <a href="mailto:David.Katzmaier@cnet.com">David Katzmaier</a>

</div>
<div>

Welcome to the Web's definitive document on the basics of choosing a new television. This updated guide will direct you through the minefield of technology terms, from LCD to LED to plasma, edge-lit to full-array, 120Hz to 600Hz, and 2D to 3D. We've sorted major issues into bite-size chunks and bullet points, based on years of experience reviewing TVs and hearing from buyers and readers about exactly what's important. We hope it helps you, too.

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/cutting-through-the-confusion/">Cutting through the confusion</a></strong>: Before we chop into the weeds, here are a few words of consolation for weary TV shoppers, and what to expect from the guide. Pull up a chair.

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/size-up-your-screen/">Size up your screen</a></strong>: How big (or small) of a screen should you get for your room? How much should you expect to pay for TVs at each screen size?

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/plasma-lcd-led-tvs/">Plasma vs. LCD vs. LED TVs</a></strong>: There are three major types of flat-screen display technology, in addition to rear-projection. What are the pros and cons of each?

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/specs-to-ignore/">Specs to ignore</a></strong>: TV spec sheets are filled with a lot of tech gobbledygook. Which of these matter, and which of these are just unimportant bells and whistles?

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/basic-features/">Basic features</a></strong>: The nitty-gritty. What are the most-important features when shopping for a TV?

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/extras/">What extra features are right for you?</a></strong>: Yes, there are some add-ons worth paying extra for--for some shoppers, at least. We highlight the important specs that may well be worth the extra cash.

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/gaming-computer-tips/">Gaming and computer tips</a></strong>: Planning to connect your TV to a gaming console or a PC? Make sure you check out these tips.

<strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/tv-buying-guide/accessories-warranties/">Accessories and warranties</a></strong>: What are the key accessories you should buy with your new TV? Are premium cables worth the money? Should you pay for the store's extended warranty program? We answer all these questions and more.

</div>
<div>
<div>CNET editors' Best HDTVs overall</div>
</div>
<ul>
	<li><img src="http://asset0.cbsistatic.com/cnwk.1d/sc/35117941-2-120-0.gif" alt="Panasonic TC-P50ST50" /> <strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p50st50/4505-6482_7-35117941.html">Panasonic TC-P50ST50</a></strong>
<div>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p50st50/4505-6482_7-35117941.html"> 4h stars </a></li>
	<li>Outstanding</li>
</ul>
</div></li>
	<li><img src="http://asset2.cbsistatic.com/cnwk.1d/sc/35118302-2-120-0.gif" alt="Panasonic TC-P65ST50" /> <strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p65st50/4505-6482_7-35118302.html">Panasonic TC-P65ST50</a></strong>
<div>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p65st50/4505-6482_7-35118302.html"> 4h stars </a></li>
	<li>Outstanding</li>
</ul>
</div></li>
	<li><img src="http://asset1.cbsistatic.com/cnwk.1d/sc/35118301-2-120-0.gif" alt="Panasonic TC-P60ST50" /> <strong><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p60st50/4505-6482_7-35118301.html">Panasonic TC-P60ST50</a></strong>
<div>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p60st50/4505-6482_7-35118301.html"> 4h stars </a></li>
	<li>Outstanding</li>
</ul>
</div></li>

	<li><a href="http://reviews.cnet.com/flat-panel-tvs/panasonic-tc-p55st50/4505-6482_7-35118300.html"> 4h stars </a></li>
	<li>Outstanding</li>
</ul>
</div></li>

		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>645</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-08-22 14:15:04</wp:post_date_gmt>

	<item>
		<title>Lawns </title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/bikes/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 22 Aug 2012 14:55:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=651</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<h2>Home Theater and Audio Systems Keep You Rockin'</h2>
Stereo systems offer an easy way to enjoy music and radio. The term is applies to both multi-function stereo units with included speakers and audio component systems which require a more involved setup. Stereo systems can be portable or designed to provide the best possible sound quality in any environment. With stereos from brands like Crosley, Sony and RCA, finding the perfect system is easy with Sears.

Typical stereo systems have a CD player, radio and other components such as cassette decks. Many newer systems have audio in jacks, which can be useful for playing audio from an mp3 player or other audio device. <a title="docking stereo systems" href="http://www.sears.com/search=docking+stereo+system?vName=">Docking stereo systems</a> can play audio from mp3 players while charging them, but most docking stereo systems are designed to work with Apple's iPod and iPhone due to the popularity of those devices.

<a title="home audio component systems" href="http://www.sears.com/search=home+audio+component?vName=">Home audio component systems</a> consist of several separate components that are connected together to provide a home stereo. The components of these systems can include dedicated CD players, radios, equalizers and usually a receiver which controls the volume and output of each component. Audio component systems can be expanded easily and can provide better stereo sound, as speakers can be placed at the best possible locations in a room for true stereo representation. Some audio component systems are also surround sound capable.

For a nostalgic music player with modern features, a <a title="turntable stereo" href="http://www.sears.com/search=turntable+stereo?vName=">turntable stereo</a> system is a great choice. These stereos often have built in CD players, radios and tape decks in addition to a quality turntable for playing various vinyl formats, including 45s and LPs. The vintage design of turntable stereos makes them a great complement to any room, and as turntable stereos are often all-in-one units with included speakers, they make great secondary stereos.

<a title="boom boxes" href="http://www.sears.com/search=boom%20box?vName=Computers%20%26%20Electronics&amp;cName=Portable%20Electronics">Boom boxes</a> and CD shelf stereo systems are designed specifically for portability. They're smaller than many hi-fi stereo systems and output less sound. Even so, boom boxes are certainly loud enough to fill a small room, and while they may not be ideal as a home's sole stereo, they're useful for playing music outdoors and for private listening.

Stereo systems range greatly in capabilities, both in terms of the type of media that they play and the quality and volume of their output. Sears offers a strong selection of stereos to fit any type of room and to meet the needs of any audio fan.

</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Buying a New Fridge?</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/buying-a-new-fridge/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 22 Aug 2012 15:09:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=665</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h2>Getting started</h2>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Our latest tests of more than 250 refrigerators revealed an expanding array of options. There are more French-door bottom-freezers than ever and quite a few models with a fourth compartment between the refrigerator and freezer. We're also seeing new finishes and features, including extra-tall water dispensers and models that reach new highs for efficiency. All that variety mean there's definitely a refrigerator out there that's perfect for you. Our buying guide will help you zero on your precise needs and desires.

</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="featuresandfridgesexpand"></a>Features (and fridges) expand</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

High-end features, such as temperature controlled drawers, adjustable shelves, split shelves, and internal water dispensers, are increasingly available on even the most affordable refrigerators. Some come loaded with features, including through-the-door ice and water dispensers, LED interior lights, and dual evaporators designed to maintain optimal humidity in their fresh food sections.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="beyondenergystar"></a>Beyond Energy Star</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

As the program turns 20, a new Most Efficient designation has been rolled out for appliances that are roughly 10 percent more efficient than Energy Star models and at least 30 percent more than non-Energy Star ones. Choosing a Most Efficient refrigerator over a non-Energy Star model could save you roughly $200 during the life of the unit.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="checkthespecs"></a>Check the specs</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Make sure the refrigerator fits your kitchen. Remember to factor in the door swing in relation to adjacent walls, cabinets, and other appliances. And leave at least a 1-inch clearance around the unit and the surrounding cabinetry to ensure adequate air flow.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="consideryourfoodshoppinghabits"></a>Consider your food-shopping habits</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Do you do a big weekly shop or like to stock up on bulk purchases? Then you may need a larger capacity than the 19 to 22 claimed cubic feet that most manufacturers suggest for a typical family of four.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="useenergyguidelabelswisely"></a>Use EnergyGuide labels wisely</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Don't look for the Energy Star alone, since efficiency standards vary by refrigerator type. A non-Energy Star-qualified top-freezer might actually be more efficient than a side-by-side with the label. For an apples-to-apples comparison, use the annual operating costs and the kilowatt-hours per year the refrigerator uses, which are listed on the yellow EnergyGuide label. Or check our Ratings, which are consistent between types, for efficiency and energy costs.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="dontbeafraidtohaggle"></a>Don't be afraid to haggle</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

Those who did saved a median of $93 on a large appliance, according to our latest reader survey of retailers. Checking market prices will help you negotiate, though basic courtesy often goes further with salespeople than hardball tactics. And skip extended warranties.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<h3><a name="considershoppingonline"></a>Consider shopping online</h3>
<div>
<div>
<div>

While most major appliances are still bought at walk-in stores, online sales hit nearly 10 percent in 2011, up from barely a blip a decade earlier, according to Ipsos, a market-research company. But you may still want to go to a showroom to check fit, finish, and features, and give the retailer a chance to match an online price.

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="electronic"><![CDATA[electronic]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="electronics"><![CDATA[Electronics]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="fridge"><![CDATA[fridge]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="general"><![CDATA[General]]></category>

		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="water"><![CDATA[water]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>widgets-metabox-enable</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:comment_id>126</wp:comment_id>
			<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[admin]]></wp:comment_author>
			<wp:comment_author_email>searswebdev@gmail.com</wp:comment_author_email>
			<wp:comment_author_url></wp:comment_author_url>
			<wp:comment_author_IP>10.98.0.67</wp:comment_author_IP>
			<wp:comment_date>2012-08-22 10:26:54</wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt>2012-08-22 15:26:54</wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[I bought a fridge, with this in mind, and ended up with a great deal!]]></wp:comment_content>
			<wp:comment_approved>1</wp:comment_approved>

	<item>
		<title>Fitness Equipment</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/fitness-equipment/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 22 Aug 2012 15:09:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=666</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<h1>Get in Shape with Fitness Equipment from Sears</h1>
<div>
<div>Whether you prefer working out first thing in the morning or after work and dinner, incorporating physical fitness into a daily routine can be a lifesaver. With 1,440 minutes in each day and your own fitness equipment from Sears, you can always find 30 minutes to burn calories, build muscle tone and enhance your overall fitness.</div>
</div>
<div>

Physical activity such as walking on a treadmill, pedaling on a stationary bike or engaging in strength training with a weight bench can benefit a body's overall health. According to the National Institutes of Health, regular physical activity can reduce the risk for cardiovascular disease and osteoporosis as well as increase metabolism and help with weight loss.

Sears offers a wide selection of fitness equipment from NordicTrack, ProForm, Sole, Bowflex, Razor, Weider, Schwinn, Horizon Fitness and more. Fitness equipment from Sears includes treadmills, elliptical trainers, exercise cycles, rowers, steppers, strength and weight training machines, inversion tables and various fitness accessories.

<strong>Treadmills:</strong> Ideal for walking or running, a home treadmill from Sears is great for cold or rainy days. Consider products from ProForm and NordicTrack, both brands offer multiple styles including treadmills with programmable fitness routines.

<strong>Elliptical trainers:</strong> An elliptical trainer can be easier on the knees than a treadmill and it offers a fantastic cardio workout. Look for products such as the NordicTrack AudioStrider 990 Pro Elliptical that feature electronic programming, heart monitors and padded foot pedals for optimum comfort.

<strong>Rowers:</strong> A common piece of fitness equipment at many gyms, now you can have a rower at home! Select a rower from LifeSpan Fitness, Sunny Health, Kettler Fitness or Stamina. Each home rower offers a great way to work both the upper body and legs.

<strong>Steppers:</strong> Work your leg muscles and get in some great cardio with steppers from NordicTrack, Stamina and Body Tone, which offers a mini-stepper ideal for limited spaces.

<strong>Strength and weight training machines:</strong> From home gym stations to dumbbells and body weights, Sears has the fitness equipment you need to build strength and tone muscle. Consider a home gym from Weider or Boxflex.

<strong>Inversion tables:</strong> An inversion table from Body Flex or Ironman can help reduce back pain. As you hang upside down from the inversion table, gravity goes to work realigning the back and relieving back discomfort.

<strong>Fitness accessories:</strong> Check out our selection of exercise mats, gym bags, health monitors and running accessories such as the Walking Advantage Talking Calorie Counter Pedometer.

Sears' selection of home fitness equipment also includes outdoor sports equipment from basketball hoops to camping gear, bikes, scooters and more. We have indoor games covered too, including a variety of gaming tables. Don't forget we offer protection plans and our Blue Crew is available online or by phone to answer any questions.

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Highly Recommended Microwaves</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/guides/highly-recommended-microwaves/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 11 Sep 2012 03:46:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?post_type=guide&#038;p=1634</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Microwave ovens are putting other appliances to shame these days as they continually get more compact and more powerful, overtaking the duties of other equipment and doing a lot of the work of meal preparation for you.

<strong>Over-the-range microwave</strong> oven hood combinations are the best example. They are installed over your stovetop and <a id="itxthook0" href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/#" rel="nofollow">perform</a> the job of the former resident, the oven hood, while also cooking, reheating and much more, all without taking any counter space.
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div>
<div><a href="http://www.googleadservices.com/pagead/aclk?sa=L&amp;ai=CZUI7yLBOUOe8IdCvqAHOtoCYAvOe6KkE27et0EyzjKTZdhABIPKZ9AFQycC8sAdgyYb_h_Cj7BKgAZXon9QDyAEBqAMBqgSXAU_QwZ9eO_WW5-OWI58FEpi2w1HHDvF0CyFSP2L_a9-UP4uEO7DGwYaSBH9pGBp4HzTDs7Jt-ypAUvD0rTj_3B420MK-oQsv_sW9i197kSUTZtvdVrdGyGH9DGtmVrZ6fjQdQOuTKCgt5POLwx-0qGQp0OgPWXrJS7xerAGK6I4O7oyiSFtjUwHM7kbJ20chrkUknpSGQ_SIBgE&amp;num=1&amp;cid=5GgzfmP3_P3EJ3Iq7MNi63UP&amp;sig=AOD64_1dJWVEEi0xVqGOABJ058cOh4CxUQ&amp;client=ca-pub-1894578950532504&amp;adurl=http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk%3B254799971%3B77916520%3Bd">Download Google Chrome</a></div>
<div>A free browser that lets you do more of what you like on the web</div>
<div><a href="http://www.googleadservices.com/pagead/aclk?sa=L&amp;ai=CZUI7yLBOUOe8IdCvqAHOtoCYAvOe6KkE27et0EyzjKTZdhABIPKZ9AFQycC8sAdgyYb_h_Cj7BKgAZXon9QDyAEBqAMBqgSXAU_QwZ9eO_WW5-OWI58FEpi2w1HHDvF0CyFSP2L_a9-UP4uEO7DGwYaSBH9pGBp4HzTDs7Jt-ypAUvD0rTj_3B420MK-oQsv_sW9i197kSUTZtvdVrdGyGH9DGtmVrZ6fjQdQOuTKCgt5POLwx-0qGQp0OgPWXrJS7xerAGK6I4O7oyiSFtjUwHM7kbJ20chrkUknpSGQ_SIBgE&amp;num=1&amp;cid=5GgzfmP3_P3EJ3Iq7MNi63UP&amp;sig=AOD64_1dJWVEEi0xVqGOABJ058cOh4CxUQ&amp;client=ca-pub-1894578950532504&amp;adurl=http://ad.doubleclick.net/clk%3B254799971%3B77916520%3Bd"> www.google.com/chrome </a></div>
</div>
<div>
<div><a href="http://www.google.com/url?ct=abg&amp;q=https://www.google.com/adsense/support/bin/request.py%3Fcontact%3Dabg_afc%26url%3Dhttp://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/%26gl%3DUS%26hl%3Den%26client%3Dca-pub-1894578950532504%26ai0%3DCZUI7yLBOUOe8IdCvqAHOtoCYAvOe6KkE27et0EyzjKTZdhABIPKZ9AFQycC8sAdgyYb_h_Cj7BKgAZXon9QDyAEBqAMBqgSXAU_QwZ9eO_WW5-OWI58FEpi2w1HHDvF0CyFSP2L_a9-UP4uEO7DGwYaSBH9pGBp4HzTDs7Jt-ypAUvD0rTj_3B420MK-oQsv_sW9i197kSUTZtvdVrdGyGH9DGtmVrZ6fjQdQOuTKCgt5POLwx-0qGQp0OgPWXrJS7xerAGK6I4O7oyiSFtjUwHM7kbJ20chrkUknpSGQ_SIBgE&amp;usg=AFQjCNHOnSIHUabt7s-0Ejh064SPgYUjnQ">Ads by Google</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<h3>Over-the-Range Microwaves: What to Look For</h3>
By their very nature these units are pretty impressive. The microwave oven part of the appliance prepares food without much input from the consumer as humidity sensors instruct the machine to shorten or lengthen cook times and temperatures. Also, when the microwave hood part of this equipment senses polluted air coming from the stovetop, many ventilation fans start automatically. The best of these over-the-range microwave ovens  the <a href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/whirplool-microwave-review.html">Whirlpool WMH2175XVS</a>, <a href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/sharp-microwave-review.html">Sharp R-1874</a> and <a href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/ge-microwave-review.html">GE PNM1871SMSS</a>  offer great features at a fair price. We think you will be surprised at how much they can simplify your life.

We looked at reasonably-priced over-the-range microwaves  neither the most expensive nor the least. This class of microwave can be priced anywhere from $200 to well over $1,000, and the upper range can, in many cases, be justified because of the amazing capabilities of some machines. Many over-the-range microwave oven models are designed to make you forget all about your oven and stovetop as they bake cakes, steam vegetables, and reheat or cook virtually anything. The best of the microwave reviews focus more on the moderate products, which also offer some pretty great features, but do so without causing major stress in most budgets. We looked at microwave ovens that will do the traditional duties of a microwave, and do them well, while adding a great ventilation system for your stovetop. Take a look at our Learning Center for even <a id="itxthook1" href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/#" rel="nofollow">more information</a> and <a href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/learning-center.html">articles on over-the-range microwave ovens</a>.

<strong>Microwave Features</strong>
Most modern microwave ovens offer sensor cooking in one form or another. This means the appliance can sense whether food is cooking properly and make temperature adjustments to finish the job. Many over-the-range microwaves include a shelf and generous capacity that allows users to reheat a collection of plates at the same time. If leftovers are on the menu for your family, you wont have to form a line. You can all come to the table at the same time. Some over-the-range microwave ovens allow you to delay start times and lock the controls so children cannot <a id="itxthook2" href="http://over-the-range-microwave-review.toptenreviews.com/#" rel="nofollow">change</a> settings. We looked for advanced features like that, but we also checked for more common items like turntables, cavity lights and a wide selection of power levels.

<strong>Vent Features</strong>
The best range microwave oven hoods offer quality vent functions in addition to quality microwave features. If you are going to have a combination appliance take the place of the traditional oven hood, you will want one that does the job of the former occupant well. A wimpy fan to handle stovetop odors will make you wish you had chosen a mere microwave instead of an over-the-range microwave and fan combination unit. A quality vent will offer multiple fan speeds, a grease filter and a charcoal filter that are easy to clean or replace. Throwing in a cooktop light is also fairly standard and very useful.

<strong>Design</strong>
The stovetop, oven and the microwave you place above them really take center stage in your kitchens dcor. We like the units that come in a variety of colors and feature attractive designs. Certain design elements, like multi-colored displays, can also add to functionality. We also looked for over-the-range microwaves that hid the vents  or at least made them look sleek and attractive.

<strong>Help &amp; Support</strong>
As with any product, we looked for a manufacturer that will stand behind the over-the-range microwave oven in question with solid warranties and customer service. Shoppers will purchase their microwave from a wide variety of sources, and it is very unlikely to be the manufacturer itself, but if there is any sign of trouble, or even a question, the original maker should be a great source of information and help  through its website, customer service representatives and warranties.

An <strong>over-the-range microwave</strong> oven can save you time, counter space and trouble by taking on the job of two appliances. The ones that do both jobs the best will offer solid features across the board and look gorgeous in your kitchen.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Sample Page</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/sample-page/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 Aug 2012 17:19:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint/community/?page_id=2</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

<blockquote>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</blockquote>

...or something like this:

<blockquote>The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.</blockquote>

As a new WordPress user, you should go to <a href="http://uxint/community/wp-admin/">your dashboard</a> to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Definition of Lorem Ipsum</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/lorem-ipsum/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 20 Aug 2012 07:17:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?page_id=239</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<div>

<a href="http://uxint-sears/community/files/2012/08/001.jpg"><img src="http://uxint-sears/community/files/2012/08/001-300x225.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="225" /></a>

<strong>Lorem Ipsum</strong> is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

</div>
<div>

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

</div>
</div>
<div>
<div>

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

</div>
<div>

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
<div class="mceTemp"><dl><dd>Lorem Ipsum</dd></dl></div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-08-20 07:17:15</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>closed</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>lorem-ipsum</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>page</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>widgets-metabox-enable</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>wpdz-metabox-sidebars_enabled</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[on]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>wpdz-metabox-dropzones_enabled</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[on]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_wp_page_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>About Sears</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/about-sears/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 20 Aug 2012 18:14:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?page_id=274</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<table width="584" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td valign="top" width="100%"><strong><a href="http://uxint-sears/community/files/2012/08/sears-roebuck.jpg"><img class="alignleft size-full wp-image-275" src="http://uxint-sears/community/files/2012/08/sears-roebuck.jpg" alt="Sears Roebuck" width="502" height="204" /></a></strong>&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

<strong>Sears, Roebuck and Co.,</strong> a wholly owned subsidiary of Sears Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ: <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q?s=SHLD&amp;d=b">SHLD</a>), is a leading broadline retailer providing merchandise and related services and is part of <a href="http://www.ShopYourWay.com">ShopYourWay</a>, a social shopping experience where members have the ability to earn points and receive benefits across a wide variety of physical and digital formats through ShopYourWay.com. Sears, Roebuck offers its wide range of home merchandise, apparel and automotive products and services through more than 2,000 Sears-branded and affiliated stores in the United States and Canada, which includes over 810 Full-line and more than 1,270 specialty stores in the U.S. Sears, Roebuck also offers a variety of merchandise and services through sears.com, landsend.com, and specialty catalogs. Sears, Roebuck offers consumers leading proprietary brands including Kenmore, Craftsman, DieHard and Lands' End -- among the most trusted and preferred brands in the U.S. The company is the nation's largest provider of home services, with more than 11 million service calls made annually. For more information, visit the Sears, Roebuck website at <a href="http://www.sears.com">www.sears.com</a> or the Sears Holdings Corporation website at <a href="http://www.searsholdings.com/">www.searsholdings.com</a>.

<a href="http://searsmedia.com/sears/sears.htm">Read more &gt;&gt;</a></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" width="400">
<div>Sears Holdings Businesses</div>
<div>
<div>Retail
- <a><strong>Sears.com</strong></a>
- <a href="http://www.searsholdings.com/about/kmart/">About Kmart</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/businesses/fullline.htm">Sears Full-Line Stores</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsholdings.com/business/dealerstores/">Sears Hometown Stores</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/businesses/sears_grand.htm">Sears Grand</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/businesses/essentials.htm">Sears Essentials</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/businesses/great_indoors.htm">The Great Indoors</a></div>
<div>Brands
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/brands/kenmore.htm">Kenmore</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/brands/craftsman.htm">Craftsman</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/brands/diehard.htm">Diehard</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/sears/brands/landsend.htm">Lands' End</a></div>
<div>Licensed Businesses
- <a href="http://www.searsportrait.com/cpi/en-US/global/MainFooterNav/CompanyInfo/careers/">Portrait Studios</a>
- <a href="http://www.searsholdings.com/business/">Business Opportunities</a>Services
- <a href="http://searsholdings.com/careers/opportunities/home%20services/">Home Services</a>
- <a href="http://www.searscard.com/">Credit Card</a></div>
</div>
<strong>Press:</strong><a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/tools/press/index.jsp">Sears Press Releases</a>|<a href="http://www.searsmedia.com/">Sears Holdings Newsroom</a>

<strong>Retirees:</strong><a href="http://www.searsholdingsalumni.com/">Sears Retirees</a></td>
</tr>

		<title>Sears Credit</title>

		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Aug 2012 01:08:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?p=58</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Extra 5% off all appliances with your Sears Card. Excludes Electrolux, Jenn-Air, Dacor, Fisher &amp; Paykel, floor care, sewing machines, countertop microwaves, water heaters, water softeners, water filtration, air conditioners, air cleaners, humidifiers, dehumidifiers, accessories, closeouts and everyday great price items. Extra 5% off cannot be combined with other Sears card discounts. Excludes Sears Commercial One accounts and Outlet Stores. Sears Home Improvement Account applies on installed merchandise only. Offer valid 8/16/12 - 8/25/12

<strong>IMPORTANT SPECIAL FINANCING/DEFERRED INTEREST DETAILS (when offered).</strong>
No interest if paid in full within 12 months on home appliance purchases over $499 made from August 16-25, 2012. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the purchase balance is not paid in full within 12 months or if you make a late payment. Minimum payments required.

With credit approval, for qualifying purchases made on a Sears card at participating stores (Sears Commercial One accounts excluded) Sears Home Improvement Account (sm) valid on installed sales only. Offer is valid for consumer accounts in good standing; is subject to change without notice; see store for details. May not be combined with any other promotion offer.

Sears cards:
As of 7/7/2012, APR for purchases: Variable 7.24%-27.24% or non-variable 14.00%-29.99%. Minimum interest charge: up to $2. See card agreement for details, including APR's and fees applicable to you.
Sears cards are issued by Citibank, N.A..

<strong>IMPORTANT SPECIAL FINANCING/DEFERRED INTEREST DETAILS (when offered).</strong>
No interest if paid in full within 12 months on hearing aid purchases of over $750 made from August 16 - September 29, 2012. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if purchase balance is not paid in full within 12 months or if you make a late payment. Minimum payments required.

With credit approval, for qualifying purchases made on a Sears card at participating stores (Sears Commercial One accounts excluded) Sears Home Improvement Account (sm) valid on installed sales only. Offer is valid for consumer accounts in good standing; is subject to change without notice; see store for details. May not be combined with any other promotion offer.

Sears cards:
As of 7/7/2012, APR for purchases: Variable 7.24%-27.24% or non-variable 14.00%-29.99%. Minimum interest charge: up to $2. See card agreement for details, including APR's and fees applicable to you.
Sears cards are issued by Citibank, N.A..]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>In-Store Issues and Orders</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/general/in-store-issues-and-orders/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Aug 2012 01:12:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?p=62</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>SEARS RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY</h1>
<a href="http://www.sears.com/cshome/nb-100000000020506">Customer Service Homepage</a>
<div>

We guarantee your satisfaction, or your money back.

Our goal is that you're completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason, you are not satisfied, simply return your purchase in its original packaging, with your original receipt/email confirmation within 90 days from the purchase date or 30 days from the purchase date for Consumer Electronics, Mattresses, air conditioners, gas powered equipment, jewelry and watches for a refund or exchange.
Video Games, CD's, DVD's, computer software and sports/toy collectibles are non returnable for a refund if opened but may be exchanged for an identical item if defective. For other items, including folding guest beds, air/inflatable beds, continuous air bouncers, water slides, pools, gas powered lawn equipment, power tools, scooters over $149.99, specialty occasion clothing, video camera/camcorders, handbags, jewelry and watches, if the original packaging has been opened or tags and/or labels have been removed the items will only be exchanged with an identical item or a substantially similar item of equal value. Returns and exchanges are not allowed on customized jewelry.
Replacement products obtained in an exchange transaction will only be exchanged and are not eligible for a refund. Where applicable, all refunds will be issued in the same form as the original method of payment. If you are still not satisfied with your purchase after your return or exchange, please let us know. Your satisfaction is important to Sears.
<div>RESTOCKING/CANCELLATION FEE POLICY (NOT APPLICABLE IN HI STORES)</div>
A 15% restocking fee is charged for:
<ul>
	<li>Consumer Electronics returned without the original box, used, or without all of the original product packaging and accessories</li>
	<li>Mattresses</li>
	<li>Built-in Home Appliances</li>
	<li>Special orders on Hardware, Sporting Goods, Lawn &amp; Garden, and Automotive merchandise</li>
</ul>
Special orders cancelled after 24 hours of purchase are subject to a 15% order cancellation fee.
<div>LANDSEND GUARANTEED. PERIOD.</div>
If you're not satisfied with any item, return it to us at any time for an exchange or a refund of its purchase price.
<div>REFUNDS WILL NOT BE GIVEN WITHOUT RECEIPT/EMAIL CONFIRMATION.</div>
We reserve the right to limit or refuse to accept return of certain products.
In addition to the Sears Return and Exchange Policy, <strong>Craftsman Tools</strong> may also be covered by product-specific warranties. Find the complete list of Craftsman product warranty statements at:
<strong><a href="http://www.craftsman.com/warranty" target="_blank">www.craftsman.com/warranty</a></strong>.

Shipping and handling charges are not refundable.
For additional questions on sears.com returns or order inquiries, please email
<a href="mailto:webcenter@customerservice.sears.com">webcenter@customerservice.sears.com</a>.
<div>SEARS PARTS DIRECT RETURNS</div>
How to return an item to Sears Parts Direct:
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://www.sears.com/csemail/nb-100000000020508?adCell=W3">Contact us</a> within 90 days of your original order date to request a Return Authorization.</li>
	<li>Upon receiving this number, your customer service representative will also provide you with a UPS return label to mail in your item</li>
	<li>You may have the return label emailed to you or mailed to your home. The emailed UPS label link expires after 10 days. If the link expires before you print the label, you must <a href="http://www.sears.com/csemail/nb-100000000020508?adCell=W3">contact us</a> to request another label.</li>
	<li>Follow the instructions provided for repackaging your return and take the package to the nearest UPS store or drop-off location.</li>
	<li>Sears Parts Direct requires a Return Authorization to ensure your return credit is processed in an accurate and timely manner. Sears Parts Direct assumes no responsibility for items returned without the appropriate authorization.</li>
</ul>
<div>SHIPPING RETURNS</div>
We now offer the ability to process a return shipping label online. To process your return, simply go to your Profile, select the item you wish to return, and complete a few quick steps. It that easy.
There are certain restrictions on items that can be returned. Shipping charges will be deducted from the credit card issued for the items you return.

Remember, you must include the return receipt in your shipping package. This will ensure the fastest returns processing time. You will receive your return receipt during the returns process.
<div>HOW THE DROP-OFF RETURNS PROGRAM WORKS</div>
After printing the shipping label, you can either tape the label to the box (not the preferred method) or utilize an address pouch that can be found at all shipping locations or with the UPS driver you hand your package to. The address pouch is a see-through protective pouch that adheres to a package and allows you to put the folded shipping label into the pouch. It is your responsibility to get the package to UPS for shipping.

The cost of this service will be the shipping charges only. There are no additional fees associated with this service.
<div>UPS DROP-OFF LOCATIONS</div>
UPS offers numerous options for dropping off a package. All UPS drivers, UPS store employees and UPS customer counter agents can accept properly sealed and labeled packages. You may also take your package to any UPS-designated Drop Box location. Packages must fit inside the container and will not be picked up if they are left elsewhere. If you would like more information about Drop Box locations in your area, please visit <a href="http://www.ups.com" target="_blank">www.ups.com</a> and select Find Locations.
<div>HOW THE UPS THREE PICKUP ATTEMPT POLICY WORKS</div>
With this option, a UPS driver carries a preprinted return shipping label when attempting to pick up the return package. UPS will attempt to pick up your package on three separate business days. If you requested this service before 9 p.m. (Central Time), the first attempt will be made the next business day.

After three failed pickup attempts by UPS, you will need to process another request through the Sears Returns Process system.

UPS charges us an additional $7 for this service. Therefore, the fee for this service will be $7 plus the shipping cost.
<div>PROPER PACKAGING</div>
If you are using a box to ship your return items, make every effort to use a new one. A box loses its original protective qualities over time and may not adequately protect your shipment if it has been previously used. If you must reuse a box, make sure it is rigid enough to withstand shipping and free of punctures, tears, rips and corner damage. Box flaps should be intact. Any old labels or other markings should be removed or covered.

To close a box securely, do not use masking tape, cellophane tape, duct tape, string or paper over wrap. Use strong, thick tape that is two or more inches in width. Apply three strips to both the top and bottom box flaps so that the middle and two edge seams are properly sealed.

Place the shipping label on the top of your package. To prevent confusion, place only one address label on your package and include your return receipt inside. Do not put any labels over edge seams, closures or on top of sealing tape. Remove or cross out old labels or markings on a used box.

For more details, please visit <a href="http://www.ups.com" target="_blank">www.ups.com</a>. For packaging assistance, please visit a UPS store.
<div>IN-STORE RETURNS</div>
Sears stores and Sears technicians cannot process a Sears Parts Direct return, but you can use an in-store kiosk to chat with a customer service representative and request a Return Authorization. Simply select the Sears Parts Direct icon at the store kiosk, click on the Chat icon, provide your order number, and request a Return Authorization number.
<div>NON-RETURNABLE ITEMS</div>
As disclosed at the time of purchase, some items are non-returnable and non-refundable. If you have any questions about this policy, please call us at 800-366-PART.
<div>MARKETPLACE ITEMS</div>
Sears.com and Kmart.com both partner with marketplace merchants who sell items on our website. If your order contains an item that is sold by Sears or Kmart, this item cannot be returned or exchanged at your local Sears or Kmart store. Your merchant's profile, which contains their specific return policy, is available via the product page.

Return policies may vary for products sold and fulfilled by third-party merchants other than Sears and Kmart. See individual merchant profile, accessible from product detail pages, for applicable merchant return policies. All returns of products sold and fulfilled by a third-party merchant, including damaged and incorrect products, must be returned directly to such third-party merchant. Please note that both Sears and Kmart do not support returns for international orders sold or fulfilled by a third-party merchant at this time. All international sales of products sold or fulfilled by these third-party merchants are final.
<div>HASSLE-FREE RETURNS &amp; EXCHANGES</div>
Sears Online merchandise can be returned in several ways:

Scheduled-delivery items (Appliances, treadmills, big-screen TVs, etc.)
<ul>
	<li>By scheduled pick up</li>
	<li>To any full-line Sears store*</li>
</ul>
Shipped items (UPS, US Postal Service, etc.)
<ul>
	<li>By mail</li>
	<li>To any full-line Sears store*</li>
</ul>
*See store for details.

To ensure timeliness, products may be shipped to you from other Sears Holdings companies or from other retailers. Please be sure to follow the return processes and procedures enclosed on the packing slips with these items.
Kmart

Product shipped from Kmart.com may be returned to any Kmart store.
<div>MAIL-IN RETURNS</div>
Except Tires, all shipped items (UPS, US Postal Service etc.), including Parts and Auction merchandise, can be returned by mail using the pack slip provided. Shipping cost will be refunded only if the product was damaged during delivery or if the wrong item was shipped.

Return Tires to a Sears Auto Center. Use our <a href="http://www.sears.com/shc/s/StoreLocatorView?storeId=10153&amp;catalogId=12605&amp;langId=-1&amp;adCell=AF&amp;adCell=W4">Store Locator</a> to find a Sears Auto Center near you.
<div>ORDER CANCELLATIONS</div>
Once an order is placed it can't be cancelled or altered. Most items may be returned within 90 days of the order date with a Return Authorization.
<div>UPS/USPS SHIPPED ITEMS</div>
Because our automated system processes your order almost immediately after you click the "Process Order" button in Checkout, it not possible to cancel your order before it fulfilled. However, when you receive the shipment, it will contain specific instructions on how to return it for a refund. In addition, home delivery of larger items can be refused, if necessary.

If you make an order that you wish to cancel, you may mail the order back after you have received it or return the merchandise to your local Sears store. If you choose this last option, please be sure to follow the correct steps on returning Sears.com merchandise.

Orders with a status of "Processing" cannot be canceled (<a href="http://www.sears.com/shc/s/LogonForm?storeId=10153&amp;catalogId=12605&amp;langId=-1&amp;adCell=W4&amp;adCell=W4">Check Your Order Status</a>). When the status changes from Processing to Shipped, it means that your order has left Sears distribution facility and is on its way to the carrier regional distribution center. Tracking numbers and other information may not be available until your shipment arrives at the carrier regional center. To contact Customer Service, please send an email to our <a href="http://www.sears.com/csemail/nb-100000000020508?adCell=W3">Customer Order Department</a> or call 1-800-349-4358.
<div>HOME DELIVERED ITEMS</div>
Home delivered orders can be canceled at any time prior to your scheduled delivery date by calling Customer Service at 1-800-732-7747.
<div>STORE PICKUP ITEMS</div>
Store pickup orders can be canceled at any time prior to actual pickup. Call the store you selected for store pickup or customer service at 1-800-349-4358. For store information, use our Store Locator.

</div>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Recommended Dishwasher from Sears</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/general/marketplace-orders/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Aug 2012 01:13:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?p=64</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>
<div>
<h2>Built-In Dishwashers From Sears Save Energy</h2>
If there is one kitchen appliance that really makes life easier than it otherwise would be, it's the dishwasher. Through this machine, countless hours of tedium are avoided and the experience of eating a home meal is no longer tainted by the specter of standing over a sink full of suds. Here are some great examples of today built-in dishwashers:

Top-rated <a title="Kenmore dishwashers" href="http://www.sears.com/kenmore-elite-24inch-built-in-dishwasher-stainless-steel/p-02213963000P?prdNo=1&amp;blockNo=1&amp;blockType=G1">Kenmore dishwashers</a> attack dirt from all angles and can clean a load in as little as one hour. They are Energy Star certified, so they save money as well as labor an Elite model is 38.9% more efficient than a comparable standard dishwasher. Kenmore dishwashers also save you from guesswork when it comes to choosing the correct cycle for your load of dishes. With just the press of a button, you can activate its automatic cycle selection and start it going. With its great cleaning power and energy-saving capabilities, these dishwashers are a great choice for those who want to get their dishes sparkling clean and save on energy costs at the same time.

Some <a title="Bosch built-in dishwashers" href="http://www.sears.com/bosch-24inch-built-in-dishwasher/p-02211909000P?prdNo=13&amp;blockNo=13&amp;blockType=G13">Bosch built-in dishwashers</a> can do an entire load of dishes with only three gallons of water using their EcoAction cycles. Their Energy Star qualification means that they also save power with their regular cycles, which helps the environment as well as your wallet. These built-in dishwashers have adjustable racks so you can easily adjust them to accommodate dishes of all sizes.

The Maytag name has been long associated with quality household appliances. A <a title="Maytag built-in dishwasher" href="http://www.sears.com/craftsman-4-cycle-mini-tiller-%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20/p-02217403000P?prdNo=12&amp;blockNo=12&amp;blockType=G12">Maytag built-in dishwasher</a> lives up to its maker's reputation with its InstaWash cycle, adjustable racks, and Auto Clean automatic cycle chooser. One great feature of a Maytag dishwasher is its ability to blast silverware with over three times the normal water pressure. You'll never have to worry about getting the utensils clean with this option engaged. With Maytag's JetClean Plus technology, your dishes aren't all that will come out looking good. The machine itself is a great enhancement to any kitchen with its modern and sleek appearance.

</div>
Get great prices on Whirlpool Dishwashers at Sears.com. Whirlpool is a brand name you can trust for quality and reliability, and Sears is the home of appliance value. We have a wide selection of Whirlpool dishwashers with<a title="Energy Star" href="http://www.sears.com/energy-star/dap-100000000023018"> Energy Sta</a> certification at competitive prices, with the best installation and protection plans around. If you want more information, check out our informative product videos or join the online discussion at mysears.com, and see what other customers are saying about Whirlpool dishwashers. And if you have a question about <a title="Whirlpool appliances" href="http://www.sears.com/appliances/v-1020003?sbf=Brand&amp;sbv=Whirlpool">Whirlpool appliances</a>, the <a title="Blue Appliance Crew" href="http://www.sears.com/sears-appliance-blue-crew/dap-100000000156053?adCell=W10">Blue Appliance Crew</a> is ready to help. Thanks for visiting Sears.com.

<h1>Gas Prices</h1>
<ul>
	<li><a title="RSS feed for Gas Prices" href="http://www.mysears.com/discussion_boards/Community/topics/Gas-Prices-1/posts/rss" rel="nofollow">subscribe to feed</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div>
<div>
<div><a title="lindiloo" href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/lindiloo" rel="noindex,nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/images/review/2012/169/22/1339988865-598038_cropped.jpg?1339988921" alt="photo of lindiloo" /></a>
<div><a href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/lindiloo">lindiloo</a> Glen Ellyn, IL posts: 278 <a href="http://www.mysears.com/help#levels" rel="nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/mysears/images/features/badges/2012_contributors_circle_2.png?e550bee?e550bee?e550bee" alt="2012 Contributors Circle " /></a></div>
</div>
</div>
<div>posted on March 26, 2012 at 08:56PM <a href="http://www.mysears.com/discussion_boards/Community/topics/Gas-Prices-1/posts#">Inappropriate?</a> <img src="http://www.mysears.com/images/comment_tail.gif?e550bee" alt="" /></div>
<div>
<div>

How much do you pay for gas? My local gas station is now selling gas for $4.55 a gallon. Yesterday, I dropped my son off at college and was able to fill up on Highway 57, about 100 miles away for $3.84. That seems like a mighty big difference.

</div>
</div>
<div>replies: 14 latest post: <a href="http://www.mysears.com/topics/Gas-Prices-1/posts#post_248608">March 31, 2012 at 09:51AM by cincybeth</a></div>

<strong>The price of crude could be as cheap as one dollar a barrell upon tapping uncharted fields in Iraq. Perhaps, it is a bit scarey to think of a revolutionary guard actually allowing a muslim shiite population an advantage over Iran. Sunni's could trade water if Austria would give them a glass with ice and I'm sure gas could be cheaper folks, but to often sustainable society's take more time than what is anticipated. 2018 seems like a long way into the future for most but when your incorperating a commodity which the world depends on its a few hours from now. Foreign policy develops at a slugs pace when she wants to move forward..... I suppose on a local level, vendors have "fixed" prices.</strong>

<strong>Another way to look at the cost of fuel for your car is to compare it to coffee. This is by far my favorite anylogy, in 1993 regular was around .95 cents a gallon while super was 1.15 a gallon. We use to pump gas, (between the flux of traffic), and fetch a cup of jo from wawa for roughly the cost of one gallon. Now, you may say, those days are so far gone but I challenge you to do the math. Those days could be coming back! My problem is the fact that starbucks is my choice to get up and go... (and wawa now gives me bad gas). Some say America runs on Dunkin; however, we are failing to see equality with the arabic bean.</strong>

<div><a title="inquisitivemind" href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/inquisitivemind" rel="noindex,nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/images/review/2010/274/15/1285963976-90131_cropped.jpg?1340414142" alt="photo of inquisitivemind" /></a>
<div><a href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/inquisitivemind">inquisitivemind</a> Portland, OR <a href="http://www.mysears.com/help#levels" rel="nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/mysears/images/features/badges/2010_friends_circle_1.png?e550bee?e550bee?e550bee" alt="2010 Friends Circle " /></a></div>
</div>
<div>
<div>posted on March 30, 2012 at 05:59AM</div>
<ul>
	<li><a href="http://www.mysears.com/discussion_boards/Community/topics/Gas-Prices-1/posts#">Inappropriate?</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
<div>
<div></div>
Wait until you are paying the same sort of prices that the Europeans, and a few other nations are paying. I know a large proportion of the European prices are taxes but again wait untilthe political leaders,ortheir successors, realise that their is a largely untapped tax goldmine 'out there'.

One other thing approximately 30% of US oil imports come from Canada and Mexico, one of these days those two nations are going to wake up and realise they could get more for their oil on the world wide market than by selling it to their neighbour. There is currently about a $20/barrel premium on the 'Brent Crude' benchmark than on the WTI bench mark. I know there are other factors 'out there' but that is, in my opinion, a real big one.

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<div>
<div><a title="ilene21" href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/ilene21" rel="noindex,nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/images/review/2011/230/12/1313689958-828746_cropped.jpg?1313689959" alt="photo of ilene21" /></a>
<div><a href="http://www.mysears.com/aboutme/ilene21">ilene21</a> Danville, VA <a href="http://www.mysears.com/help#levels" rel="nofollow"><img src="http://www.mysears.com/mysears/images/features/badges/2012_chairmans_circle_5.png?e550bee?e550bee?e550bee" alt="2012 Chairman's Circle " /></a></div>
</div>

Gas is 3.75 here and counting,it appear to go up higher every day!!!!!

	<item>
		<title>Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators Whirlpool Refridgerators AND THERE </title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/general/whirlpool/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Aug 2012 20:15:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?p=69</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>Whirlpool Refrigerators</strong>
<div>

You can depend on Whirlpool, one of the most respected brands in home appliances, to furnish your kitchen with a refrigerator that will last for years to come. Sears offers Whirlpool refrigerators in countless models at a wide range of price points to meet every need. The current line includes four basic configurations. The traditional top-freezer and side-by-side models continue to be popular while the bottom-freezer and French-door designs combine convenience with modern style. Many models also include a Whirlpool refrigerator ice maker. In addition to an attractive appearance that pleases the eye, Whirlpool has developed a number of high-tech features to help keep the contents of your refrigerator as fresh as the day you brought it home.

<strong>Traditional Value: Top Freezer </strong>If you're looking for an exceptional value in Whirlpool refrigerators, you can afford to overlook the top-freezer models. This is the classic configuration many people are most familiar with. It offers a variety of sizes to meet the needs of any size family, and can even serve as an inexpensive secondary refrigerator for overflow. For maximum flexibility, look for a model with a reversible door that allows it to be placed in any location.

<strong>A New Twist on an Old Favorite: Bottom Freezer</strong>If your family uses more fresh food than frozen, these Whirlpool refrigerators put perishable items at eye level for easy access. You can choose between a swing door and a pull-out drawer for the bottom freezer. These units also come in a variety of sizes to meet any need.

Plenty of Door Space: The Side-By-SideMade popular in the 0s by the in-door water dispenser, these Whirlpool refrigerators continue to be a best-selling model. With more space in both the freezer and the doors, this is optimal choice for those who like to see everything at a glance. Although this model doesn look much bigger than the top-freezer model, it provides substantially more storage per square foot of floor space.

<strong>The Epitome of Style: French Doors</strong>This new Whirlpool refrigerator configuration is the latest in a long line of attractive styles. Sleek and modern, these models provide the most flexible storage options with dual refrigeration compartments on the top along with a bottom freezer. Although all Whirlpool refrigerators are known for this brand's commitment to energy efficiency, the ability to open a smaller section of the larger unit to preserve the chilled air makes a big difference to both your energy and grocery bills.

<strong>Whirlpool Refrigerators: High-End Finishes for Your Kitchen</strong>Because stainless-steel appliances offer both durability and an attractive finish, Whirlpool has developed four different finishes to meet this demand. Depending on your home dor and budget, choose from full stainless steel, monochromatic stainless steel, a stainless look, and a monochromatic stainless look. Of course, if you prefer a more traditional appearance, you can also select Whirlpool refrigerators in white, black, silver, or biscuit finishes.

<strong>Cutting-Edge Whirlpool Technology</strong>Whirlpool has always been a leader in the appliance industry, but the company has taken technology to an entirely new level with its selection of current models. When shopping for a new Whirlpool refrigerator, keep an eye out for these useful features:
<ul>
	<li>Accu-Chill Temperature Management Double-tub construction and foam-in-place doors maintain exact temperature readings in both the freezer and refrigerator compartments.</li>
	<li>Electronic Temperature Controls This touchpad takes the guesswork out of setting the temperature levels.</li>
	<li>6th Sense Smart Sensors With built-in intelligence, models equipped with smart sensors automatically adjust settings to maintain the perfect environment to keep your food fresh and safe.</li>
	<li>In-Door LCD Panel This easy-to-read monitor provides real-time information at the touch of the button without the need to open the refrigerator door.</li>
	<li>Pur Water Filtration System Consumers can go six months between filter changes on models equipped with an in-door water filtration system.</li>
</ul>
<strong>Whirlpool Refrigerators: An Eco-Friendly Choice</strong>
You be hard-pressed to find a single Whirlpool appliance that isn Energy Star compliant. This choice not only protects our precious environmental resources, but it also is easy on the budget. Compared to older appliances, your new refrigerator will use less energy while keeping your food fresher!

In addition to refrigerators, Whirlpool makes an entire line of home appliances including freezers, stoves, dishwashers, washers and dryers, air conditioners and water heaters. Whirlpool refrigerator parts are easy to obtain if necessary, and each product comes with a Whirlpool refrigerators manual. As a testament to Whirlpool durability and dependability, KitchenAid and Amana refrigerators, and Kenmore and Maytag refrigerators are actually made by this well-known appliance manufacturer. For kitchen appliances you can depend on year in and year out, choose Whirlpool refrigerators from Sears.

</div>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Protection Agreements</title>
		<link>http://uxint-sears/community/general/protection-agreements/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Aug 2012 01:20:52 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>admin</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://uxint-sears/community/?p=74</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<h1>Protection Agreements</h1>
<a href="http://www.sears.com/cshome/nb-100000000020506">Customer Service Homepage</a>
<div>
<div>Sears Protection Agreements Coverage you can count on!</div>
<strong>Enhance your Coverage and Enjoy Peace of Mind!</strong> Don't be caught off guard! Join over 13 million customers who have Peace of Mind. By getting a Master Protection Agreement or a Repair Protection Agreement, you've made a smart decision. Now your product is protected against the unexpected.

<strong>Youl be glad you have benefits like these: </strong>
<ul>
	<li><strong>EXPERT REPAIR SERVICE:</strong> Expert Service for Innovative Products. Sears own Blue Service Crew repair technicians have the training and knowledge to get every job done right.</li>
	<li><strong>PRODUCT REPLACEMENT:</strong> If your covered product cannot be fixed we'll replace it. And deliver and install if needed.</li>
	<li><strong>FOOD LOSS REIMBURSEMENT:</strong> Receive money back for food spoilage caused by a mechanical failure.</li>
	<li><strong>SAVINGS: </strong>25% discount on non-covered repairs and related installed parts.</li>
	<li><strong>TROUBLESHOOTING: </strong> Call 1-800-4-MY-HOMEfor non-technical assistance on your product.</li>
	<li><strong>SATISFACTION:</strong> Over 13 million Sears customers already trust our protection so you can too.</li>
</ul>
<div>Call 1-800-4-MY-HOMEOur specialists are ready to advise you on how a Sears Protection Agreement can work for you.
or visit <strong>searshomeservices.com</strong> to schedule your service.

</div>
<div>Master Protection Agreement</div>
Missing the Big Game? No Hot Water? Ruined Food? You can afford to have your Major Appliances or Electronics out of order very long! Give yourself Peace of Mind and Protect yourself from unexpected repair expenses with a Sears Master Protection Agreement, the most comprehensive protection agreement in the industry and our highest level of coverage.
<ul>
	<li><strong>Expert Service </strong></li>
	<li><strong>Covers Parts and Labor </strong></li>
	<li><strong>Covers cosmetic defects and parts for 3 years </strong></li>
	<li><strong>Annual preventative maintenance check</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Food Loss </strong></li>
	<li><strong>Reimbursement (up to $250) </strong></li>
	<li><strong>"No Lemon" guarantee for full product replacement Reimbursement of rental expenses </strong></li>
	<li><strong>25% discount on non covered repairs &amp; related installed parts </strong></li>
	<li><strong>The Master Protection Agreement can be renewed &amp; transferred</strong></li>
</ul>
<div>Call 1-800-4-MY-HOME*Some limitations and exclusions apply. <a href="http://www.sears.com/shc/s/nb_10153_12605_KB_PAGrowthTC" target="_blank">See the Terms &amp; Conditions of the Protection Agreement.</a>

</div>
<div>Repair Protection Agreement</div>
<strong>Save</strong> Time and Money, <strong>Reduce</strong> Expenses and Worries, and <strong>Protect</strong> your Investment. For those who want peace of mind at a more economical price, the Sears Repair Protection Agreement is the smart, affordable way to protect the products you depend on every day.
<ul>
	<li><strong>Expert Service</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Covers parts and labor</strong></li>
	<li><strong>25% discount on non covered repairs, &amp; related installed parts</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Comparable product replacement up to $1,500</strong></li>
	<li><strong>Rapid Resolution</strong></li>
	<li><strong>The Repair Protection Agreement can be renewed &amp; transferred</strong></li>
</ul>
Only available in stores on Lawn &amp; Garden products.
<div>Call 1-800-4-MY-HOME*Some limitations and exclusions apply. <a href="http://www.sears.com/shc/s/nb_10153_12605_KB_PAGrowthTC" target="_blank">See the Terms &amp; Conditions of the Protection Agreement.</a>

</div>
<div>Sears Purchase Protect</div>
Peace of mind for just Pennies! Sears Purchase Protect provides replacement coverage for 3 years on Sears brands (Kenmore &amp; Craftsman) and 2 years on non-Sears brands.
<ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>Smart and convenient replacement coverage<strong></strong></strong></li>
</ul>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>If it breaks, call us and we'll send a gift card for the full purchase price.<strong></strong></strong></li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><strong>No hassle refund just call or visit our website<strong></strong></strong></li>
</ul>
<div>Call 1-800-573-1088or visit <strong>searspurchaseprotect.com</strong>

*Some limitations and exclusions apply. <a href="http://www.sears.com/shc/s/nb_10153_12605_KB_PAGrowthTC" target="_blank">See the Terms &amp; Conditions of the Protection Agreement.</a>

</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>

<div>Offer Service not available in all areas. An area is defined as 250 square feet. Combination areas and areas greater than 250 square feet are considered separate areas. Call for details. Other restrictions may apply. Offer expires 8/31/2012.</div>
</div>

</div>
